snippet: An Israeli soldier was lightly wounded by shrapnel on Wednesday when two mortar shells fired from Syria hit a military post in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights.
abstract: Israeli soldier is lightly wounded by shrapnel when two mortar shells fired from Syria hit a military post in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli soldier was lightly wounded by shrapnel on Wednesday when two mortar shells fired from Syria hit a military post in the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights.

headline.main: Israel: Soldier Hurt by Mortar Shells From Syria
headline.print_headline: Israel: Soldier Hurt by Mortar Shells From Syria
